name: SEE! Demo
description:
This is a game a friend and I are working on, this is basically what we have so far

What it's about: The princess has disappeared, more like, she left without telling anyone when she has duties to attend to. The King and Queen aren't surprised their daughter walked off, it's a common occurrence that the princess walks away.

You, a deer/human hybrid, are the princess personal guide, guard, and just a caretaker in general, and your job is to simply find her, but you can't leave the castle til you find someone to come with you to help you with the search.
